channel.title: Mybatis on 无心技术簿
channel.description: Recent content in Mybatis on 无心技术簿

item.title: mybatis实例
item.description: <!-- 批量插入 遇到重复key 改为更新 需求设定--> <insert id="addBatchDepartment" parameterType="java.util.List" > INSERT INTO department ( branchId, branchName, common, spellId) VALUES <foreach collection="list" item="item" index="index" separator="," > ( #{item.branchId}, #{item.branchName}, #{item.common}, #{item.spellId} ) </foreach> ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE branchId = values(branchId) </insert> 增 <insert id="addStudent" parameterType="java.util.Map"> insert into student (id,name,age) values ( #{item.id}, #{item.name}, #{item.age} ) </insert> 批量 <insert id="addStudent" parameterType="java.util.Map"> insert into student (id,name,age,start_time) values <foreach collection="list" item="item" index="index" separator=","> ( #{item.
